name: gotoanything
description: Visual Studio Code plugin that displays a Quick Pick input with capabilities similar to Sublime Text 3 Go To Anything functions

GoToAnything.prefix.Functions.description: Prefix to invoke search by function name. Empty string to disable. The default is @

GoToAnything.prefix.Declarations.description: Prefix to invoke search for declarations. Empty string to disable. The default is $

GoToAnything.prefix.Commands.description: Prefix to invoke a command search (active only on first char). Empty string to disable. The default is >

GoToAnything.prefix.Symbols.description: Prefix to invoke search for all symbols in workspace (active only on first char). Empty string to disable. The default is #

GoToAnything.prefix.Recent.description: Prefix to invoke the vscode go to file search (active only on first char, no functions or declarations search). Empty string to disable. The default is *

GoToAnything.symbols.Functions.description: List of symbol types to include in the Functions search. For options visit: https://github.com/Cmacu/gotoanything/blob/master/src/symbolIcons.ts

GoToAnything.symbols.Declarations.description: List of symbol types to include in the Declarations search. For options visit: https://github.com/Cmacu/gotoanything/blob/master/src/symbolIcons.ts

GoToAnything.previewDelay.description: The delay in miliseconds for displaying the selected dropdown item (only if preview is enabled)
